title: New: Kwesachu – Bird Milk ft. Dels and Bella Wilde
body:
This time yesterday, I was chatting to friend about the idea of **Micachu** making beats for **Dels**.

Turns out it had already happened; I feel pretty silly. The product of this sentiment is making me feel better though, the new cut, taken from the **Kwesachu** **Vol. 2 mixtape**, is a dense, sprawling and hip-popping number.

The surrealist hook is also pretty rad.

Hit play and go to town.
